mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPORTS ( REPORT_NUM, USER_NUM, TYPE, TARGET_ID, TARGET_USER_NUM, REASON, DETAIL_REASON, STATUS, CREATED_AT ) VALUES ( REPORTS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{userNum}, #{type}, #{targetId}, #{targetUserNum}, #{reason}, #{detailReason}, '접수', SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT r.report_num, r.user_num, r.reason, r.detail_reason, u.nick_name, r.type, r.target_id, r.status, r.created_at, r.processed_at, b.release_date FROM reports r LEFT JOIN USER_TB u ON r.user_num = u.user_num LEFT JOIN BANNED_USER b ON r.user_num = b.user_num WHERE r.report_num = #{reportNum}
